name: Farmhand Go!
description:
Farmhand Go! is a casual and easygoing game about growing and selling crops. In this active farming game, your goal is to pay off your farm debt by growing seeds and selling the harvested crops. Days move quickly in Farmhand Go! and the crows are always waiting and watching for some tasty crops to nibble on! Buy low, sell high, and try to keep the crows at bay in this brand new farming game unlike any other you've played!

"Wonderful premise, it was really fun to play!" - Generic Games

"This was really fun! Great job!" - ilovedolphins7313
